reviews.review_msg: Glen did a really great job of teaching the course! At times the material was tough, but at the end of the day you just have to work hard to get a good grasp over the material.

Glen is awesome. He is very knowledgeable and caring. Although the course material can be tough, he makes some jokes during the class to change the atmosphere of class. He is a really fair prof in grading. I would take another course if he offers one. Don't hesitate to take class with him. He is 10 out of 10.
Awesome Prof and Hilarious!!! So far only had a midterm with him but that was pretty easy. The debate in the class is kind of annoying though

Hands down the best prof I've ever had. Those lucky enough to learn from him all agree that he's also an incredible and fascinating human being. He has a gift for making difficult concepts graspable, engaging, and funexciting to learn. He invests a lot of time and energy in his students and their learning. Educationjust a piece of paper-He is why

Hands down one of the best profs at SFU. 412 is a phenomenal course, but it should not be taken lightly. Listening to the recordings is an absolute must for this course. Though he can be a bit intimidating at first, Glen has a great sense of humour and is always open to answering questions. I would take a class with him again in a heartbeat

He's the best prof that I've ever had. I haven't met anyone who knows as much as he does in this field. Not only that but also his ability to make complex concepts comprehensible is second to none. His questions are straightforward and his marking is very fair. The debate is challenging but very exciting and teaches you a lot.
